dc_title_s: Map of the upper portion of the Mahoning River Basin showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Scale bar lower left corner of map.|Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the upper Mahoning River Basin and quality of underground water.|"Prepared by JAMES W. CUMMINS, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
